product_name: The North Face Resolve Rain Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Resolve rain jacket gives active girls the waterproof and breathable protection they need for their outdoor adventures. Ripstop nylon with 2-layer HyVent (TM) coating and sealed seams is strong, lightweight, windproof, waterproof and breathable. Polyester mesh lining wicks moisture away from the skin to keep your child warm and comfortable. Ergonomic hood tucks away into collar. Brushed collar lining and chin guard offer soft, moisture-wicking comfort. The North Face Resolve jacket features zippered hand pockets, elasticized cuffs, rip-and-stick front zipper closure and an ID label.
short_description: The North Face Resolve rain jacket gives active girls the waterproof and breathable protection they need for their outdoor adventures.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
